definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: Bilateral trade reached US$59.66 billion in 2008 and approached US$43 billion in the first nine months of 2009.
sentences.chinese: 2009年前9個月，雙邊貿易額近430億美元。

sentences.english: Each country's aggregate international trade is expanding by 23-24% annually.
sentences.chinese: 兩國各自的國際貿易額每年擴展23%到24%。

sentences.english: China has worked to boost trade with several countries in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 中國努力提高與中東國家幾個國家的貿易額。

sentences.english: The China-Africa trade volume has exceeded 100 billion U.S. dollars for the first time in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年中非貿易額首次突破1000億美元。

sentences.english: General trade and foreign-funded enterprises export trade amounted to more than 8000 million.
sentences.chinese: 一般貿易和三資企業出口貿易額達8000多萬美元。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, US annual trade with Asia-Pacific countries has gone beyond one trillion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 美國與亞太國家的年貿易額超過1萬億美元。

sentences.english: Ten years ago, China–U.S. trade stood at only $102.6 billion.
sentences.chinese: 10年前，中美貿易額僅有1，026億美元。

sentences.english: S. dollars. General trade and foreign-funded enterprises export trade amounted to more than 8000 million.
sentences.chinese: 一般貿易和三資企業出口貿易額達8000多萬美元。

sentences.english: China said the Sino-U. S. trade hit 212 billion U. S. dollars last year.
sentences.chinese: 中國方面說，去年中美貿易額達到了2120億美圓。

sentences.english: We trade about a trillion dollars in goods and services each year.
sentences.chinese: 歐美每年商品服務貿易額都達數萬億美元。

sentences.english: China is now the world’s third-largest trading nation with 6 percent of world trade.
sentences.chinese: 現在，中國卻是佔世界貿易額6%的第三大貿易國。

sentences.english: Two-way direct foreign investment between Canada and India is relatively low.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大與印度的雙邊貿易額相對還很小。

sentences.english: The bilateral trade volume has reached one new height after another and the scale of two-way investment has been continuously expanded.
sentences.chinese: 兩國貿易額連創新高，雙向投資規模不斷擴大。

sentences.english: With the trade volume increasing by over 100 folds more than the time when the two sides established diplomatic ties, bilateral economic and trade cooperation has witnessed outstanding progress.
sentences.chinese: 經貿合作成果顯著，貿易額比建交時增長百餘倍。

sentences.english: It trades more with the EU than any other partner.
sentences.chinese: 中國與歐盟的貿易額比其他地區都多。

sentences.english: The picture shows the development trend of Sino-Australian bilateral trade volume.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲中澳雙邊貿易額髮展趨勢。
